snippet: The race was a classic clash between generations and ideologies, and Ben Chin, an activist with a liberal alliance, substantially outspent the incumbent, Robert E. Macdonald.
abstract: Republican two-term mayor Robert E Macdonald of Lewiston, Me, wins third term, defeating young liberal activist Ben Chin with 53 percent of vote.
lead_paragraph: The race was a classic clash between generations and ideologies, and Ben Chin, an activist with a liberal alliance, substantially outspent the incumbent, Robert E. Macdonald.

headline.main: Robert E. Macdonald Wins 3rd Term as Mayor of Lewiston, Maine
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Mayor Wins Third Term in Maine City
